remarks.format:
## Remarks A scope is disconnected after creation until someone explicitly calls <xref:System.Management.ManagementScope.Connect%2A>, or uses the scope for any operation that requires a live connection. Also, the scope is disconnected from the previous connection whenever the identifying properties of the scope are changed.
## Property Value `true` if a connection is alive (bound to a server and namespace); otherwise, `false`.
